story_27_55000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Every. Single. Time! You’ve caused nothing but
trouble for me with your cheeky little tricks!
story_27_55000/2401_1001_0200_10:
After all we’ve been through, you haven’t
changed a single bit! If you’d just obeyed my
orders for once, none of this would have...
story_27_55000/2401_1001_0400_10:
No... That’s not why any of this happened.
The problem isn’t that you haven’t changed...
story_27_55000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I wanted to grow stronger—I wanted to
protect myself.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_0700_10:
More than anything else, I wanted to
become king.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Instead, I got crushed battle after battle,
I distanced myself from my retainers, and I
wound up getting captured by Team Break.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_0900_10: I probably don’t deserve to be king anymore.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Hmm... Is that a hint of regret I hear in your
voice, Lear?
story_27_55000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Hehe. It sounds like captivity is starting to humble
you a bit.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_1300_10:
But this doesn’t even begin to compare to what
you put us through!
story_27_55000/2401_1001_1400_10:
The public humiliation we endured after you
defeated us.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_1500_10:
The resentment we felt after you denied us
becoming PML Leaders.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_1600_10:
That’s what brought all of us together in the first
place. The hatred we share for you and the
tournament is what formed Team Break!
story_27_55000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Grudges like ours don’t just go away when you
snap your fingers, Lear.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’m not interested in hearing your sob story.
Why don’t you just get to the point?
story_27_55000/2401_1001_2000_10: You’re not here to chitchat, are you?
story_27_55000/2401_1001_2100_10: You got some nerve talking to us like that.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Enough. If the prince wants to know why we’re
here, why don’t we tell him?
story_27_55000/2401_1001_2300_10:
All right. As you may have guessed, we’ve got a
big plot under way, Lear—a way for us to use
all of the Pokémon we’ve stolen.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_2400_10:
We’re going to storm the arena once more, and
this time, we’re going to utterly sabotage the PML
once and for all!
story_27_55000/2401_1001_2600_10:
There’s just one problem. The audience members
and Pokémon are innocent in all of this. My heart
aches at the thought of them suffering.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_2700_10:
How about you make a personal announcement to
them saying that the PML is officially canceled?
story_27_55000/2401_1001_2900_10:
As long we get to destroy your precious PML,
we’ll be happy. It’s enough for us to see it fall.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Once we have confirmation that the tournament’s
collapsed, we’ll let you go. Fair enough, don’t
you think?
story_27_55000/2401_1001_3200_10: So, what do you say, Lear?
story_27_55000/2401_1001_3400_10:
It sounds like this is the end of the PML no matter
what I choose.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_3500_10:
I couldn’t even participate in my quarterfinal
matches yesterday, so my chance to win the
tournament is gone.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_3600_10:
I called myself the strongest Trainer of all and then
got completely crushed by you lowlifes.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_3700_10:
And on top of all that, I ruined things with my
retainers. My father will probably never hand
down the crown to me now.
story_27_55000/2401_1001_4100_10:
I’ll do what you asked. Let’s hurry up and
get this over w—
story_27_55000/2401_1001_4200_10:
Wha—?! What’s it doing?! It shouldn’t be able to
move right now!
story_27_55000/2401_1001_4300_10:
This is bad—it must be up to something!
Capture it now!
story_27_55000/2401_1001_4400_10: Wha—?! It’s trying to use its powers on Lear!
